# Overview
Monthly dependency update to help maintain Search.

## NPM
These dependencies have been updated to their latest versions:
- `@emotion/react`
- `@emotion/styled`
- `@reduxjs/toolkit`
- `citeproc`
- `core-js`
- `eslint`
- `eslint-config-standard`
- `eslint-config-standard-jsx`
- `eslint-config-standard-react`
- `eslint-plugin-import`
- `eslint-plugin-n`
- `eslint-plugin-node`
- `eslint-plugin-promise`
- `eslint-plugin-react`
- `jsonschema`
- `prejudice`
- `pride`
- `prop-types`
- `qs`
- `react`
- `react-autosuggest`
- `react-cookie`
- `react-dom`
- `react-modal`
- `react-redux`
- `react-router-dom`
- `react-scripts`
- `react-tabs`
- `regenerator-runtime`
- `underscore`
- `url`

## Workflows
These actions have been updated to their latest versions:
- `actions/checkout`
- `actions/setup-node`
- `docker/build-push-action`
- `docker/login-action`
- `docker/setup-buildx-action`
- `docker/setup-qemu-action`
- `softprops/action-gh-release`

## Testing
- Install the updated packages (`npm install`).
- Start [the site](http://localhost:3000/everything) to see if everything still works (`npm start`).
- Make sure the PR is consistent in these browsers:
  - [x] Chrome
  - [x] Firefox
  - [x] Safari
  - [x] Edge
